verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He is joy unspeakable and full of glory, Full of glory, full of glory. He is joy unspeakable and full of glory, And His glory we can now behold.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have found the fullness I once craved Since the joyful One moved in. What a wondrous blessing, I am saved From the emptiness of sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I have found a joy no tongue can tell While the waves of glory roll. Christ is now a great o’erflowing well, Springing up within my soul.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
